titles.title: Improving Congressional Oversight of CFIUS Determinations Act

To amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to require congressional notice if the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States notifies a party to a covered transaction that the Committee has completed all action with respect to such transaction, and for other purposes.
Improving Congressional Oversight of CFIUS Determinations Act

bill.summary:
Improving Congressional Oversight of CFIUS Determinations Act
This bill modifies the review process of the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS) to require notice to Congress when it completes a review of certain expedited transactions with a foreign entity.
